import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Todos.css" import data from "../../mock-data.json" const Todos = () => { const [contacts, setContacts] = useState(data); const [addFormData, setAddFormData] = useState({ fullName: "", address: "", phoneNumber: "", email: "" }); const handleAddFormChange = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const fieldName = event }; return ( <>
{ contacts.map((contact) => ( )) } {/* */}

); }; export default Todos;
